title: Trans 'woman' posts sobbing selfie after TSA agent allegedly 'punched' their very-female testicles
description:
A transgender "woman" is upset because the airport TSA allegedly punched their very female testicles. Which apparently means TSA is now transphobic. I can honestly get on board with this if it means we can abolish the TSA. I'm almost always patted down during those screenings and it's not pleasant.

This beautiful and brave person posted a now-deleted sobbing selfie from a bathroom stall and explained that their beautiful and brave balls "still hurt so bad". They also claimed TSA yelled at them for having a penis. In a separate post, they clarified, "'I don't want the TSA agent that hurt me fired. I want her educated and the entirety of TSA abolished altogether."

None
— (@)

After the testicle-punching incident, the TSA worker apparently followed the trans person into the bathroom and discussed what just happened with another coworker, while the trans individual wept in a stall. Which does sound like slightly psychotic behavior, not gonna lie.

The airport has since said they are investigating the incident and responded to the trans individual on Twitter, writing, "We apologize again for your experience. Your comments have been noted and shared."

This has happened before, and it's apparently due to screenings detecting an "anomaly" between trans "women's" legs. AKA their lady penis. This anomaly sets off the alarm in the body scanner and leads to uncomfortable screenings. And apparently, punches to their lady testicles.

What's left out of this story is how uncomfortable it probably makes female TSA agents who have to grope a trans person's testicles because their passport says female. I can understand why the agent would be so upset. Though the following to the bathroom, if true, is a tad over the line. So as much as I hate the TSA, this is just another example of creating problems that really shouldn't exist in the first place. But alas, welcome to 2023.

>

<

Lily is a Zoomer college dropout who somehow landed a writing gig here at LwC.com. In her spare time, she enjoys going for runs, touching grass, and occasionally tweeting tweets for fellow tweeters.

title: Watch: Black mom puts white liberals on blast over "ethnic studies" bill they want to force on kindergarteners
description:
This may shock you to learn, but the People's Republic of Minnesota is looking to divide students by race and play them off of each other. No, it's not a "C" and a "T" with an "R" in the middle. After all, we all know that is NEVER taught in public school, nor does it influence what is taught in public schools. Minnesota wants to force what they call an "ethnic studies" requirement for children as young as kindergarten.

Sounds harmless, but so does "Inflation Reduction Act" and "Common Sense Gun Reform." Don't take my cracker-ass word for it. Allow this black mother who has students in the district speak out on what this is all really about.

9/

"This curriculum will not help kids of color succeed. All it does is remove any reason to try."

"You want to tell my kids & other kids of color that they can't succeed? It's shameful, it's terrible. I ask that you please vote against this bill."

Watch the EXTRAORDINARY vid: pic.twitter.com/EKehDShTqy
— Free Black Thought (@FreeBlckThought) March 25, 2023

This bit is key:

"I can see why you white proponents of this bill might support it. It's not your kids being told that they can't succeed, and you get to shed some of your white guilt in the process. But you legislators of color, how can you? You made it despite the invisible boogeyman of systematic racism. You were voted in by a majority of white people. You hold some of the most powerful positions in this state. Yet you want to tell my kids and other kids of color that they can't succeed?"

Yes, that's exactly what they want to do. Because while leftists throughout the county have made clear their political agenda takes precedence over the well-being of our children, that goes double for OUR schools.

And contrary to what those same leftists want you to believe, this mother is not the only parent who shares her percentage of melanin who believes children shouldn't be taught to hate each other and indoctrinated by bitterly partisan teacher's union members.

>

<

Brodigan is Grand Poobah of this here website and when he isn't writing words about things enjoys day drinking, pro-wrestling, and country music. You can find him on the Twitter too.

title: Watch: Comedian confronts man who preys on 12-year-olds to play the "NewlyPED Game" and it's absolutely amazing
description:
I had to triple-check that this wasn't satire, but no, it's very real. Comedian Collin Shumaker said this is episode three of his pedophile hunting-turned-game show series. He tracked down a pedo named David who sent a "14-year-old" (Collin) pictures. Collin explained that, due to his actions, he's now on the "Newlyped Game," and if he answers three out of five questions correctly, Collin won't call the police. (This is a lie. He does, in fact, report the pedos to the police, regardless of their gameshow performance.)

None
— (@)

His first question was, "what year was the model T invented?" And this man said 1970. It was 1908. I guess pedos aren't too versed in American history.

Collin then asked, "what is 5 plus seven?" The pedo used his fingers to count to 12. Collin's last question was, "how old was the child you were sending photos to?" And David of course answered correctly - 14. He didn't have to use his fingers to count this time.

Even though he got three questions right, Collin clairified that he will obviously still be turning him in to the police before showing some of the chat lots they have between David and the "14-year-old".

Collin sent a few messages that said, "I'm in high school still cuz I'm 14. What do you do for work David?"

David replied, "I am looking for a job. Babe. I love you Craig."

David later sent "Craig" a loooong stream of messages that said, "Craig I love you babe. May I ask you something else. Does your mom and dad know you are gay." He also called him his "sexy boyfriend Craig," told him he loved him, and sent a shirtless selfie.

I never thought I would laugh at a pedophile-bust video, but here we are. The perfect blend of comedy and pedophile hunting. Hats off to Collin.

>

<

Lily is a Zoomer college dropout who somehow landed a writing gig here at LwC.com. In her spare time, she enjoys going for runs, touching grass, and occasionally tweeting tweets for fellow tweeters.

title: Watch: UFC veteran uses her post-fight victory speech to take a stand against the sexualization of our children
description:
Former UFC champion Holy Holm finished off her opponent in lopsided fashion. Not known for being overtly political (though one can guess where she lines up), she used her post-fight interview to speak out against the sexualization of our children.

UFC Superstar Holly Holm uses her win tonight to call out the sexualization of children! 😮👀 pic.twitter.com/UWBOxielCY
— An0maly (@LegendaryEnergy) March 26, 2023

I get the impression she didn't go into the fight planning to speak out after she won. The extent of her statement was, "hey...stop sexualizing kids." Holm didn't give any specific examples. Feel free to fill in the blanks yourself. We had three examples on Friday alone that would fall under sexualizing kids.

Holly was questioned about it at the post-show press conference and doubled down. Claiming she doesn't like getting political, and that this isn't a right vs. left thing.

Holly Holm explains why she used the platform of her #UFCSanAntonio post-fight interview to speak out about the sexualization of children.#UFCSanAntonio | Full video: https://t.co/f3wyzrR4if pic.twitter.com/98tnbG96TL
— MMA Junkie (@MMAJunkie) March 26, 2023

Here's the rub. I'm glad Holly spoke out. We should stop sexualizing children. That shouldn't be a controversial position to stake, yet few in the public eye will. Where Holm is wrong is that this IS a right vs left issue. The right thinks we should stop sexualizing children. The left thinks you're a homophobe for wanting to stop sexualizing children. And that if we prevent teachers from hiding things from parents, it's literally fascism.

Sexualizing children is one of the legs of the left-wing three-legged stool. The other two are "everything is racist," and "any opposing viewpoint on the internet is misinformation."

Sexualizing children is the cornerstone of the Democrat Party's agenda. This most certainly IS a right vs left issue.

>

<

Brodigan is Grand Poobah of this here website and when he isn't writing words about things enjoys day drinking, pro-wrestling, and country music. You can find him on the Twitter too.

title: Great news! Kanye says he's no longer an anti-semite after watching a Jonah Hill movie
description:
Exhale, America. Kanye West aka Ye no longer hates the Jews. All it took was a Jewish actor and a ten-year-old movie. Ye was watching 21 Jump Street, saw a young (and newly svelte) Jonah Hill, and decided the Jews are a-ok after all.

To recap, 2022 ended with Kanye on a downward spiral. And, in his words, the Jews were to blame. That would be bad enough. But from there, he praised Hitler as a good guy. Ye went so off the deep end, even Alex Jones was like...dude!

We can leave all that in 2022. It's 2023, and after watching 2012's 21 Jump Street, Kanye has seen the era of his ways. All it took was the artistic stylings of Jonah Hill. Kanye made amends in an Instagram post.

Watching Jonah Hill in 21 Jump street made me like Jewish people again

No one should take anger against one or two individuals and transform that into hatred towards millions of innocent people

No Christian can be labeled antisemite knowing Jesus is Jew

Thank you Jonah Hill I love you.

It's a remake of the 80s TV show, and like most remakes is little more than a parody of the source material, including the necessary Johnny Depp cameo. In Kanye's defense, the movie is damn funny. Hill, Channing Tatum, and Ice Cube all crushed it.

Though if I'm being honest, upon hearing Jonah Hill cured Kanye of his antisemitism, this was the first thing that came to mind:

When Ye says Jonah Hill and 21 Jump Street made him not hate Jews anymore… pic.twitter.com/li7hMVXcdo
— Louder with Crowder Dot Com (@LWCnewswire) March 26, 2023

I'll let everyone else on all the internets argue about Kanye's sincerity. It's more important to know when the movie is coming out. Because if Judd Apatow hasn't started writing the script, I don't know why we even have a Hollywood.

They can reboot Get Him to the Greek, where Hill is sent to revitalize Russel Brand's career. Only instead of addiction, the megastar's career was ruined over unfortunate Hitler comments. Idris Elba can play the Kanye character. Leslie Mann can play the Kim Kardashian character. Seth Rogan can play Pete Davidson.

Netflix would kill for such a million-dollar idea!

>

<

Brodigan is Grand Poobah of this here website and when he isn't writing words about things enjoys day drinking, pro-wrestling, and country music. You can find him on the Twitter too.
